official_title: Assessment Of A Novel Metabolic Imaging Modalities As A Predictor Of Therapeutic Efficacy In Glioblastoma (GBM)
inclusion_criteria:
* Any participant that consents to entry into the Phase II BPM31510 parent study (BPM31510IV-11)
* Women of childbearing potential must have a negative pregnancy test
* Ability to understand and the willingness to provide written informed consent.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Refuse to have an IV
* Allergy to MRI contrasts
* Diabetic patients who are taking insulin
